amendment.description: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 115-785 to reduce funding for the Office of the Secretary of Defense by $10,000,000 and increases funding for the Defense POW/MIA Accounting Agency by $10,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lynch amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A018) offered by Mr. Lynch.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lynch amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.
